song_name: Piano Concerto In G Major - Mvt I
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Piano Concerto In G Major - Mvt I is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
